text: Rero kubera impamvu z’uguhonyanga amasezerano yabo, twaciye tubavuma n’ukugira imitima yabo kuba nk’ubutare muguhindura amajambo ahari ayo majambo, n’ukwibagira amwe mu majambo bibukijwe, kandi uzoguma ubandanya uronka inkuru z’ububisha bwabo atari muri bakeyi gusa muribo, rero n’ubagirire ikigongwe kandi ubareke mu vy’ukuri Imana ikunda abagira ineza
